mapper.select: select t.user_id as userId, t.role_id as roleId, t.role_name as roleName, (select server_name from game_server gg where gg.server_id=t.server_id) as serverid, t.level as level, t.rank as rank, date_format(t.last_login, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastLogin, t.login_count as loginCount from server_rank_total t where EXISTS (select server_id from game_server g where g.server_id=t.server_id and g.sort_id=7) order by rank desc LIMIT 500
